title: A Greystar Comunity waiting for you!!!
posting_body: Call Now -
show contact info
This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 950 Sq.
Ft.
Picture yourself in a gorgeous garden apartment at 5400 Vistas, an upscale community.
Offering one, two and three bedroom layouts.
From appealing features such as hardwood flooring to modern conveniences such as in-home dishwashers and washer and dryer sets, you’ll have everything you need to live well.
Enjoy fun in the sun at our sparkling renovated pool.
Additionally, you can sit by the outdoor fireplace, work up a sweat in the fitness center or cook on the barbecue grills.
Conveniently located near RTC transit and I-95, you’ll enjoy easy access to the entire Las Vegas Valley.
Endless enjoyment awaits you at 5400 Vistas.
Come see your next apt.
today.
Features:
- Walk-in closet in each bedroom, - Fireplace, - Carpeted bedrooms, - Roommate style floor plan, - Private patio/balcony
Community Amenities:

Close to Park, On-Site Management, Pet Friendly, Outdoor Swimming Pool, On-Site Fitness Center, Dog Park, BBQ Grills, Playground, Convenient Locations, Outdoor Fireplace, Gated Community, Carport Parking
Pet Policy
We welcome 2 pets per apartments home.
There is a $300 non-refundable pet fee for 1 pet, and a $500 non-refundable pet fee for 2 pets.
Pet rent is $25 per pet, per month.
The weight limit is 75 lbs per pet, and aggressive breeds are prohibited.
Please contact our leasing office for more information about our pet policy.
Income Requirements:
Three times the base rent amount.
